name: HapticAI
description: Haptic is an innovative feedback layer designed for training and subsequently upgrading Large Language Models (LLMs) and various AI networks. Utilizing its decentralized human feedback infrastructure, Haptic acts as a bridge, seamlessly connecting AI training process and human cognition. We aim to boost the way AI training and optimization are carried out by focusing on a token incentive model to gather the highest quality of feedback and training data.
